release.action: Mailing lists for the project were created.
Sub-package inclusion problem was fixed in the code generator.
Build system was brought up to date with current maven.
Jira was configured for the project.
Jira notification mail was directed to apropriate mailing list.
Roadmap document was created.
Coral 0.1 was released.
CoralQuery initial implementation was ported for ARL. There's more work to be done though.
Common base classes were extracted from GenericResource/PersistentResource and respective handlers.
PersistentResource + handler were ported from ARL
Session pooling problem was fixed.
BaseCoralView/Action were moved to coral-web from cyklotron project.
Entities toString() method was changed to report information useful for debugging.
Unicode escaping problems in resource names were fixed.
Javacc support code was improved to avoid unecessary source file modifications.
Methods for retrieveing attirbutes w/ default values were added to generated interfaces.
Added convenience methods for checking if a given attribute is defined.
PersistentResource support were added to the code generator.
'description' attribute was removed from coral.Node class.
Problems with building coral-maven-plugin were fixed.
Problems with PersistentResource/GenericResource constructor signatures were resolved.
Jira house cleaning was performed for the project.
